This code system http://bbraun.de/fhir/infusion/CodeSystem/GPlusMedicationAdministrationStatusCS defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
in-history In HistoryThe administration has been reported back and now is archived
prescribed PrescribedThe administration has been prescribed but not yet given to the patient
